title: Sports better

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not pick a game that occurs after the night phase ends normally.
- The night may not end until the conclusion of the game,
- If it the game chosen is not a championship game, then you will appear to not yet have done your action. If it is, it will be public that there's a Sports Better.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have 5 people see their team win

desc:
Post 827
*So you think this game's gonna be a blow out for your life, or a blow out for the other team?*
Abilities
- Pick 2 players and a sports game that's happening that night. Both of them must choose a team to win, if victorious, they receive something beneficial depending on the role (extra charges, an extra vote, ect.), if they lose, they die.
